snippet: By Saturday morning, cars were littered across the expressway, some abandoned on the side of the road, and officials estimated that hundreds of drivers had been stranded.
abstract: New York officials estimate that hundreds of drivers have been stranded or have abandoned their cars on the Long Island Expressway due to winter storm that affected the Northeast; some areas of Long Island are smothered in more than two feet of snow.

byline.original: By NATE SCHWEBER and VIVIAN YEE

lead_paragraph: By Saturday morning, cars were littered across the expressway, some abandoned on the side of the road, and officials estimated that hundreds of drivers had been stranded.

headline.seo: On the Long Island Expressway, Cold, Hungry and Stranded
headline.main: Cold, Hungry and Stuck on the L.I. Expressway
headline.print_headline: Cold, Hungry and Stuck on the L.I. Expressway
